sense.def:
A hint
je posredno izražen predlog o nečem.

seg.quote: As yet no hint had appeared as to who was going to be the next Foreign Secretary.

sense.def:
To drop a hint
pomeni posredno nekaj predlagati.

seg.quote: He had dropped several hints that he knew where Mary was.

sense.def:
To take a hint
pomeni razumeti nekaj, kar je bilo izraženo posredno.

seg.quote: She may take the hint and become more organized.

sense.def:
To hint at something
pomeni posredno nekaj predlagati.

seg.quote: Harold hinted at what she had already guessed.
I tried to hint that I deserved an increase in salary.

sense.def:
A hint
je tudi nasvet, ki nam je v pomoč.

seg.quote: The magazine had the usual hints on fashion and cookery.

sense.def:
A hint of something
je zelo majhna količina nečesa.

seg.quote: There was a hint of disapproval in her face.
